name: ᒫᒪᐃᐧ  mâmawi
description:
ᒫᒪᐃᐧ 
Cree: mâmawi
"all together, all together as a group; collectively"

i came into NFT space in February 2021.  the first week here one evening i sat upright in bed and turned the lights on.  
NFTipi and three red triangles came into my mind. i quickly got up and turned my computer on to do a domain search.  i registered and set a quick website up and made my clubhouse profile NFTIPI. 
the three triangles are my tipi representations of community. it is a global community as you all are each one tipi and collectively we are here as more. 
i chose the color red as my mother(a medewiin elder) who told me that our ancestors can see the color red. this is why we offer tobacco in red cloth-for them to see us and for us to connect with them.

the very first words i put onto my clubhouse, twitter profile and the two graphics i ever made with one of my tipi renditions in march 2020 is  ᑭᓇᓈᐢᑯᒥᑎᐣ kinanâskomitin (thank you I am grateful to you). 
it is a community piece that many have been asking for fro me. to acknowledge my 6 months here and the first part of the first direction EAST/SPRING of my Medicine Wheel Foundation photography. i am finally putting this work out here on TEZO with another  
is community version on ETH blockchain
